description.value: PEDISWoundGrade is a classification system for diabetic foot ulcers and stands for Pefusion-Extent-Depth-Infection-Sensitivity. Each of these is rated according to defined scales, the individual ratings combined into a total score which is reported as the result. No LOINC code to associate with this yet.
